General.Name: Ways Technical Ltd
General.Description: Ways Technical Corp., Ltd. manufactures and processes plastic daily necessities, surface treatment, and related products of electronic components in Taiwan. It also manufactures, processes, and sells water appliance materials, plastic products, and coatings; produces and sells mobile phone panels, molds, hardware products, smart phones, tablet computers, navigation systems, and digital cameras; and manufactures and sells mechanical equipment and electronic materials. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Yangmei, Taiwan.
